definition: shallow sea/sea less than 200 meters deep
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: Seahorses like to live in shallow waters amongst the seaweed and eelgrass.
sentences.chinese: 海馬喜歡住在海藻或鰻草叢中的淺海。

sentences.english: A high speed traffic boat for shallow waters has been studied and designed.
sentences.chinese: 研究設計了一艘適用於淺海油田的高速交通艇。

sentences.english: Secondary positioning technique is one of key techniques of seismic exploration in neritic transitional zone.
sentences.chinese: 二次定位技術是淺海過渡帶地震勘探的關鍵技術之一。

sentences.english: That makes sense, because the fishing is more intense there.
sentences.chinese: 這並不難理解，因爲淺海處的捕魚更加密集。

sentences.english: The Ordovician system is characterized by the tidal flat facies with a few shallow sea facies.
sentences.chinese: 奧陶系以發育潮坪相爲特徵，並有少量淺海沉積。

sentences.english: Zhuanghai district is located in the south of neritic area in Bohai gulf.
sentences.chinese: 摘要樁海地區位於濟陽坳陷渤海灣南部極淺海地區。

sentences.english: The modified water masses in the shallow sea area are represented with the concept of fuzzy subsets .
sentences.chinese: 應用模糊子集的概念描述淺海區變性水團。

sentences.english: Sea surface and bottom constituted sound propagation environment of the neritic acoustic duct field.
sentences.chinese: 海面與海底構成了聲源淺海海域波導場的聲傳播環境。

sentences.english: A group of young seahorses drifts in shallow waters off Manly, New South Wales, Australia.
sentences.chinese: 一羣小海馬在澳大利亞新南威爾士的曼利淺海區遊移。

sentences.english: Some marginal fields are found in gudong oldfield shore zone.
sentences.chinese: 孤東油田極淺海區域新發現幾個邊際油藏。

sentences.english: Foraminifera indicate an outer neritic paleobathymetric setting.
sentences.chinese: 有孔蟲類顯示了外圍淺海的古代水深。

sentences.english: There were mainly neritic shelf and bathyal filling sedimentation in the Pliocene and Quaternary.
sentences.chinese: 上新世和第四紀主要爲淺海陸架及半深海充填沉積。

sentences.english: A high speed traffic boat for shallow waters has been studied and designed. The boat has a deep-V hull form.
sentences.chinese: 研究設計了一艘適用於淺海油田的高速交通艇。

sentences.english: Design and implementation of finite state automaton on USSD dialogue;
sentences.chinese: 提出一種用有窮狀態自動機研究淺海聲場的方法。

sentences.english: Asaumi, however, said the return to a six-day week will not be total.
sentences.chinese: 不過淺海準一表示，並非全面恢復週六上課。

sentences.english: The Taijiang fauna formed in inner shelf environment.
sentences.chinese: 形成於內陸棚淺海環境。

definition: Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan
pinyin: Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2

definition: to camp/to pitch camp/stationed/quartered/Taiwan pr. [zha2 ying2]
Nan'ao Island in Shantou 汕頭|汕头[Shan4 tou2], Guangdong
lit. men's footprints are rare (idiom)/fig. off the beaten track/lonely/deserted
